name: Compliance Dashboard Access for Contractors
description: As a Contractor, I want to click on the Compliance Dashboard module so that I can navigate to the Compliance Dashboard for my company

background.text: I am logged in as a contractor

scenarios.name: Contractor successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page

steps.text: I am on the home page
I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should display the compliance icon
the module should display the title "Compliance Dashboard"

scenarios.name: Contractor successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I am on the home page
I can see the Compliance Dashboard module
I click the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
the dashboard should display my company's compliance data

scenarios.name: Contractor bypasses companies list and lands directly on company dashboard

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click the Compliance Dashboard module
I should not see a companies list view
I should land directly on my company's dashboard
the dashboard should show my company name in the header

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct visual elements

steps.text: I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should be visible
the module should contain a compliance icon
the module should display "Compliance Dashboard" as the title
the module should be clickable

scenarios.name: Multiple clicks on Compliance Dashboard module work correctly

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I navigate back to the home page
I click the Compliance Dashboard module again
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard again

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard navigation preserves contractor context

steps.text: I am on the home page as a contractor
I click the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see the Compliance Dashboard for my specific company
the page should maintain my contractor role context
I should not have access to other companies' data

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module not accessible when user not authenticated

steps.text: I am not logged in
I attempt to access the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
I should be redirected to the login page

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard module not visible for non-contractor roles

steps.text: I am logged in with a non-contractor role
I am on the home page
I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
the module should not be accessible to my role

scenarios.name: Navigation fails gracefully when dashboard service unavailable

steps.text: I am on the home page
the Compliance Dashboard service is unavailable
I click the Compliance Dashboard module
I should see an appropriate error message
I should be able to retry the navigation

scenarios.name: Keyboard navigation works for Compliance Dashboard module

steps.text: I am on the home page
I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using keyboard
I press Enter on the module
I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
the navigation should work the same as clicking

scenarios.name: Compliance Dashboard loads within acceptable time limits

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click the Compliance Dashboard module
the dashboard should load within acceptable time limits
I should see a loading indicator during navigation
the dashboard should display my company's data completely

scenarios.name: Browser back button works after navigating to Compliance Dashboard

steps.text: I am on the home page
I click the Compliance Dashboard module
I am navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
I click the browser back button
I should return to the home page
the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible

gherkin_content:
Feature: Compliance Dashboard Access for Contractors
  As a Contractor, I want to click on the Compliance Dashboard module so that I can navigate to the Compliance Dashboard for my company

  Background:
    Given I am on the application
    And I am logged in as a contractor

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Contractor successfully views Compliance Dashboard module on home page
    Given I am on the home page
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should display the compliance icon
    And the module should display the title "Compliance Dashboard"

  @smoke @positive
  Scenario: Contractor successfully navigates to Compliance Dashboard
    Given I am on the home page
    And I can see the Compliance Dashboard module
    When I click the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    And the dashboard should display my company's compliance data

  @positive @navigation
  Scenario: Contractor bypasses companies list and lands directly on company dashboard
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should not see a companies list view
    And I should land directly on my company's dashboard
    And the dashboard should show my company name in the header

  @positive @ui
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module displays correct visual elements
    Given I am on the home page
    Then the Compliance Dashboard module should be visible
    And the module should contain a compliance icon
    And the module should display "Compliance Dashboard" as the title
    And the module should be clickable

  @positive @interaction
  Scenario: Multiple clicks on Compliance Dashboard module work correctly
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    When I navigate back to the home page
    And I click the Compliance Dashboard module again
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard again

  @positive @context
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard navigation preserves contractor context
    Given I am on the home page as a contractor
    When I click the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see the Compliance Dashboard for my specific company
    And the page should maintain my contractor role context
    And I should not have access to other companies' data

  @negative @security
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module not accessible when user not authenticated
    Given I am not logged in
    When I attempt to access the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I should be redirected to the login page

  @negative @authorization
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard module not visible for non-contractor roles
    Given I am logged in with a non-contractor role
    When I am on the home page
    Then I should not see the Compliance Dashboard module
    And the module should not be accessible to my role

  @negative @error-handling
  Scenario: Navigation fails gracefully when dashboard service unavailable
    Given I am on the home page
    And the Compliance Dashboard service is unavailable
    When I click the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then I should see an appropriate error message
    And I should be able to retry the navigation

  @edge-case @accessibility
  Scenario: Keyboard navigation works for Compliance Dashboard module
    Given I am on the home page
    When I navigate to the Compliance Dashboard module using keyboard
    And I press Enter on the module
    Then I should be navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    And the navigation should work the same as clicking

  @edge-case @performance
  Scenario: Compliance Dashboard loads within acceptable time limits
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click the Compliance Dashboard module
    Then the dashboard should load within acceptable time limits
    And I should see a loading indicator during navigation
    And the dashboard should display my company's data completely

  @edge-case @browser
  Scenario: Browser back button works after navigating to Compliance Dashboard
    Given I am on the home page
    When I click the Compliance Dashboard module
    And I am navigated to the Compliance Dashboard
    When I click the browser back button
    Then I should return to the home page
    And the Compliance Dashboard module should still be visible
